Benefit Eligibility of Survivors
Survivors of a  recognized Veteran whose sole service was in the Philippine Commonwealth Army are
only
eligible for SC death benefits and burial allowance.  They are
not
entitled to Survivors Pension.
Reference
:  For more information on eligibility to VA benefits based on service in the Philippines, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.A.2
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Eligibility for Benefits Based on Philippines Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
